text:
Determination and Madness

Tense confrontation in a dim room  
A heavy silence looms.  
Speaker 1: “You may all go to hell!”  

Speaker 1: “I can’t make head or tail of this!”  
Speaker 2: “When did you see them last?”  

---  

Frantic worry in a crowded hallway  
Whispers of concern fill the air.  
Speaker 2: “Your mother is seriously ill!”  

Speaker 2: “She wouldn’t hear a word!”  
Speaker 2: “Now she’s in a fever.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The speaker confronts someone about their madness and neglect of their ill mother and sister, expressing concern over their behavior.
